title: TDEE Kalkylator
description: Beräkna your Totalt Daglig Energy Expenditure
metaDescription: Gratis TDEE calculator - Beräkna your total daily energy expenditure baserat på age, weight, height, and activity level to reach your fitness goals.

activity.active: Active (daily träning or intense träning 3-4 gånger/vecka)
activity.extraActive: Extra Active (very intense träning daily & physical job)

results.title: Din Totalt Daglig Energy Expenditure
results.bmrDesc: Kalorier your body needs at rest

info.title: Om the TDEE Kalkylator
info.description: Totalt Daglig Energy Expenditure (TDEE) represents the total number of calories your body burns in a day, including your basal metabolic rate (BMR) and calories burned through physical activity. This calculator uses the Mifflin-St Jeor equation to calculate your BMR and multiplies it by your activity level.
info.mifflinFormula:
Män: BMR = 10 × weight(kg) + 6.25 × height(cm) - 5 × age + 5
Kvinnor: BMR = 10 × weight(kg) + 6.25 × height(cm) - 5 × age - 161
TDEE = BMR × Aktivitet Factor
info.sedentaryDesc: Little or no träning, desk job
info.activeDesc: Daglig träning or intense träning 3-4 times per week
info.extraActiveDesc: Very intense daily träning plus physical job or training twice per day
info.limitations: These estimates are general guidelines. Individual energy needs may vary baserat på metabolism, body composition, genetics, and other health factors. Consult with a healthcare professional or nutritionist for a personalized plan.
